paper_abstract: A new fuzzy mathematical programming model for supply chain planning under supply, process and demand uncertainty is proposed in this paper. A tactical supply chain planning problem has been formulated as a fuzzy mixed integer linear programming model where data are ill-known and modeled by fuzzy numbers with modified s-curve membership functions. The fuzzy model provides alternative decision plans to the decision maker (DM) for different degrees of satisfaction. Finally, the proposed model is tested by using data from a real automobile supply chain.
paper_title: FUZZY LINEAR PROGRAMMING FOR SUPPLY CHAIN PLANNING UNDER UNCERTAINTY
